ActivateTormentMode_SecondsToCharge.Description: number of seconds to fully charge the torment mode

MaxNumberOfTrailPointInGame.Description: Max number of normal trail point simultanusly alive in the game

MaxNumberOfRestrictionTrailPointInGame.Description: Max number of restriction trail point simultanusly alive in the game

TormentTrailPointAliveTime.Description: Time a regular torment trail pont is alive

TormentMode_ForcedPitch.Description: force pitch of the player in torment mode

TormentMode_NotMovingYawScaleMultiplier.Description: value that multiply YawScale for control when the player is no moving while in torment mode

TormentMode_NotMovingYawAdjustTime.Description: time needed to adjust the new yawscale shool be 0 if want to be an instant change

TormentMode_ChargeWalkSpeed.Description: walk speed when killer is charging torment mode

TormentMode_PauseChargeRate.Description: charge rate when player is in torment mode and not moving on ground or falling

TormentMode_MinimumPercentToActivate.Description: minimum percent needed to start the power

TormentMode_AttackConsumePower.Description: how much of a power will the attack consume use -value 0 for nothing -10 ( = to max charge) for consume all power

AttackTrail_TimeIntervalBetweenPoint.Description: delay in seconds beween spawn of point in the trail

AttackTrail_Lenght.Description: lenght of the attack trail in cm

AttackTrail_ConsideredAsASlopeAngle.Description: What angle do we considere as a slope to avoid trail to climb on object in the game

AttackTrail_DamageCooldownTime.Description: cool down time were survivor can't get damage from an attack trail again

AttackPointDelayToEnableCollision.Description: time werte we enable collision to enable dame when the point is spawned

TormentMode_Cooldown.Description: cool down time when stop using torment mode

RestrictionRangeToHooks.Description: player cant spawn normal trail at X cm of hooks

RestrictionRangeToGenerators.Description: player cant spawn normal trail at X cm of generator

RestrictionRangeToExitSwitch.Description: player cant spawn normal trail at X cm of exitSwitch

TormentTrailRevealDistance.Description: distance in witch the trail is revealed to the killer

DeathBed_AnticampZoneDistance.Description: ditance that will trigger the anticamp systme if killer step in it

DeathBed_AnticampZoneTimeToTrigger.Description: time where the killer need to be in the zone to trigger the anti cheat system

DeathBed_AnticampDrainCooldownTime.Description: cool down from drain and aura reading when the anticamp trigger
